submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        # 1. 全交替的情况 ==> n
        # 2. 部分交替 ==> slen - k + 1
        n = len(colors)
        i = 0
        while i < n and colors[i] != colors[(i+1)%n]:
            i += 1
        
        if i == n:
            return n
        
        res = 0
        start = i+1
        arr = colors[start:] + colors[0:start]
        i = 0
        while i < n:
            j = i
            while j < n-1 and arr[j] != arr[j+1]:
                j += 1
            slen = j - i + 1
            res += max(0, slen - k + 1)
            i = j + 1
        return res
